name: Blue Insides
description:
You fall down into a deep blue cave. You have to get out, by breaking the magic crystal. Will you take the correct path towards freedom?

This game was made for the Wowie jam 3. The theme was "Faliure is progress". How does this game fit the theme? In the game you'll have to make a choice to pick a path, which you think will lead to frredom. If you fail to pick the correct path, you're still making progress, because now you know where to go.

Here's my twitter where I post about games: https://twitter.com/TheoTheTorch and here's my reddit account where I do mostly the same: https://www.reddit.com/user/TheoTheTorch

Credits:

+ Whiteshampoo - Awsome jump and dash pyhsics.

+ Jonas Tyroller - Ambient music. (Wowie pack 2)

+ freesound.org - All sound effects.

+ LTGD discord server - All the motivation and feedback!

+ Font: Minecraftory
